name: Miyagi IRL Supernatural Jam
description:
Save humanity with a transformer that can transform between a turret and a rocket!

Left click to shoot as a turret or power engine as a rocket

Right click or Spacebar to transform

Made for https://itch.io/jam/supernatural-jam

  • Built with Godot 3.1.1 https://godotengine.org/
  • Drawings with Paint.NET https://www.getpaint.net/index.html
  • SFW generated using https://www.bfxr.net/
  • Background music take from https://ozzed.net/music/cor-metallicum.shtml
